original_title: ข้างหลังภาพ
overview: Reminiscing the past when he was in school in Japan, Nopporn has an opportunity to meet and take care of Chao Khun Atigarn and his young wife Lady Kirati, a friend whom he will never forget. Every time when Chao Khun was busy, Nopporn would take care of the Lady and accompany her to various places, they exchange their thoughts and feelings.
title: Behind the Painting
